dict.acceptation: ……后的；（表示时间）在……以后；（表示位置、顺序）在……后面；

sent.orig: After become effective of property insurance contract, those who serve as insurance mark insurance belongings reachs his to concern a benefit, because the meeting is buying and selling, given, accede to wait for the happening of the circumstance and be transferred, after the cession of insurance mark, the alienee that insurance profit meets what change insurance bid subsequently of course.
sent.trans: 财产保险合同生效后，作为保险标的的保险财产及其有关利益，会由于买卖、赠予、继续等情况的发生而转移，保险标的转让后，保险利益当然会随之转移给保险标的的受让人。

sent.orig: After dinner sit awhile, after supper walk a mile.
sent.trans: 正餐以后，休息片刻；晚餐以后，步行一里。

sent.orig: The general trend under heaven is that there is bound to be unification after prolonged division and division after prolonged unification.
sent.trans: 天下大势， 分久必合，合久必分。

sent.orig: A bright rainbow arched above after the rain.
sent.trans: 雨后彩虹在天上形成弓状。
